contentrichtext.text: '''Wonderful Life''' may refer to: *[[Wonderful Life (book)|''Wonderful Life'' (book)]], a 1989 book on evolution by Stephen Jay Gould == Film and television == *[[Wonderful Life (1964 film)|''Wonderful Life'' (1964 film)]], 1964 film starring Cliff Richard *''Wonderful Life'', original Japanese title of ''[[After Life (1998 film)|After Life]]'', a 1998 Japanese film directed by Hirokazu Koreeda *[[Wonderful Life (2004 TV series)|''Wonderful Life'' (2004 TV series)]], 2004 Japanese television drama *[[Wonderful Life (2005 TV series)|''Wonderful Life'' (2005 TV series)]], 2005 South Korean television drama == Music == *[[Wonderful Life (Black album)|''Wonderful Life'' (Black album)]], Black's 1987 debut album **[[Wonderful Life (Black song)|"Wonderful Life" (Black song)]], a 1986 song from the album *[[Wonderful Life (Cliff Richard album)|''Wonderful Life'' (Cliff Richard album)]], Cliff Richard with the Shadows' soundtrack album for the 1964 film ''Wonderful Life'' *[[Wonderful Life (Hurts song)|"Wonderful Life" (Hurts song)]], the second single from Hurts' debut album ''Happiness'' *"Wonderful Life", a song from Gwen Stefani's album ''[[The Sweet Escape]]'' *"Wonderful Life", a song from Nick Cave's album ''[[Nocturama]]'' *"Wonderful Life", a song from Alter Bridge's album ''[[AB III]]'' ==See also== *[[A Wonderful Life (disambiguation)]] *[[It's a Wonderful Life (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
